item.title: DevOps Fundamentals! Bread Maker Analogy üçû
item.description: DevOps is like a bread maker üçûüê±‚Äçüèç it takes a variety of inputs, processes them, and produces a final product with minimal manual intervention. Just like how you add ingredients to a bread maker (flour, yeast, sugar, etc. üç∞), DevOps involves providing code, infrastructure, and automation to produce a continuous flow of delivery. Let‚Äôs break down the 3 fundamentals of DevOps and explore some best practices using the bread maker analogy!
